info.title: Daily Horoscope API
info.description: Your go-to source for daily horoscope readings for all 12 zodiac signs, along with fascinating fun trivia. Covers six essential categories: Personal Life, Professional Life, Health, Emotions, Travel, and Luck. Provides comprehensive astrological experience with daily, weekly, and historical horoscope readings.

get.summary: Get horoscope reading for zodiac sign
get.description: Retrieves horoscope readings for all 12 zodiac signs across six essential categories: Personal Life, Professional Life, Health, Emotions, Travel, and Luck. Supports daily (today, yesterday) and weekly readings.

parameters.name: zodiacSign
parameters.description: Zodiac sign for horoscope reading, e.g.: aries, taurus, gemini, cancer, leo, virgo, libra, scorpio, sagittarius, capricorn, aquarius, pisces

parameters.name: timePeriod
parameters.description: Time period for horoscope: today (current day), yesterday (previous day), or weekly (week ahead)
